text: Atahpara tamra palanakarta tamke uttama bhabe grahana kare nilena ebam tamke prabrd'dhi dana karalena-atyanta sundara prabrd'dhi. Ara tamke yakariyara tattbabadhane samarpana karalena. Yakhana'i yakariya meharabera madhye tara kache asatena takhana'i kichu khabara dekhate petena. Jijnesa karatena"mara'iyama! Kotha theke esaba tomara kache elo?" Tini balatena, "esaba allahara nikata theke ase. Allaha yake iccha behisaba riyika dana karena.
